Welcome to pyMouserParts’s documentation!¶

Contents:

Reads in Mouser Order History file(s).

Usage¶

Program is run by either typing python pyMouserParts.py or double clicking pyMouserParts.py.

Output¶

Code¶

class pyMouserParts.processMouserParts¶

Class to process the Mouser files.

doParts()¶
Returns:True when completed

The executive which calls all of the other functions.

goThroughTheParts(newPartsList, partsFileName)¶
Parameters:
  • newPartsList – location of the path/file name
  • partsFileName – location of the path/file name
Returns:

True when completed

Process the parts list.

processPL(newPartsList)¶
Parameters:newPartsList – location of the path/file name
Returns:list of parts sorted by manufacturers

Go through the list of parts and store the lines into a list.

List consists of 3 types of lines. Example line(s):

  • Mouser #: ,279-CFR16J4K7
  • Mfr. #: ,CFR16J4K7
  • Desc.: ,Carbon Film Resistors - Through Hole4.7KOhm 1/4W 1200PPM,,100,$0.013,$1.30,100 Shipped ,7/25/2014 ,35662549
readInParts(partsFile)¶
Parameters:partsFile – location of the path/file name
Returns:file contents as a list

Read the parts file into a list for easier processing.

selectMouserParts()¶
Returns:path/name of the file that was selected. Empty string if none selected.

This is the dialog which locates the Mouser files

class pyMouserParts.UIManager¶

The UI

about_pymouserparts(b)¶

The about message

openIF(b)¶

Read the file and process it

quit_application(widget)¶

quit
